name: Click The Circle (Vimlark)
description:
Made for the One Minute Game Jam

Click The Circle is a mouse controlled reaction game where you click the circle as many time as you can before time runs out. How high can you score?

There are 2 game modes, each with 2 time limits.

15 Sec Reaction - Click the circle as many times as you can in 15 seconds.

15 Sec Identify - Click the circle as many time as possible in 15 seconds with other shapes appearing to distract you.

15 Sec Reaction - Click the circle as many times as you can in 15 seconds.

15 Sec Identify - Click the circle as many time as possible in 15 seconds with other shapes appearing to distract you.

There is a dark mode if the background is too bright.
Reset ALL HIGH SCORES - SHIFT + 9
